rows.label: tlk006401_07_msg0001
rows.name:
Lilio and his gang are now good enough
to go salvaging on their own.

rows.label: tlk006401_07_msg0002
rows.name:
This is all thanks to Rex
suggesting we hire them.

rows.label: tlk006401_07_msg0003
rows.name:
Maybe Rex has a special eye
for judging people.

rows.label: tlk006401_07_msg0004
rows.name:
In any case, we've got us a promising
bunch of up-and-coming salvagers for
your trouble, and for that, I'm grateful.
